Senior Java DeveloperI have been considered a senior Java developer for 2 years now. Not so diferent from being a "do everything" programmer. I had a large career ind evelopment, since doing full -ugly- Quick Basic 4.5 programs (MS-DOS) for 6 years, c/c++ for 3 years, ASP Web apps for 3 years, I hace 6 and a half years developing in java. And among all of this, I was an active deviant for almost 4 years. I've been now to the US. 2 times (deliveryng finished programs to the client- releases). I have grown a lot in this past 2 years. Working with people that handle some aspects of java better than me has made me grow. (I only have 1 SJCP Certification, some people here have 2 or 3 certs, and they are good.) Also I became quite good with PLSQL... What happened to the dreams? of making movied or videogames? on hold. I became 30 1 month and a half ago, and that keeps me thinking I need a new more permanent Job. So If any deviants can recomeSenior Java Developer5 years ago in Personal More Like This
